channel.title: Drama Homework /lock
channel.description:
Is my Drama homework good enough? It was to write a short cliff hanger: EDIT: Made 2, First one is the one i gave in, Second one was for fun.
---------------------------------The Murder-------------------------------------------- Jake: Hey, Got the knife?
Mack: (running to Jake) Yeah, Are we gonna..?
Jake: (walks to the car) Yeah Bro, The guy’s sleeping by now.
Mack: (follows jake) Oh ok, I don’t get a good feeling about thi… (BANG!)
Jake: (running away) Mack!!!!
Dun Dun Dun!!! TO BE CONTINUED ----------------------------------End---------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------Beginning-----------------------------------------------
Jake: Yo, Mack!
Mack: Hey, Jake!
Jake: I've been thinking about what you said the other day..
Mack: You've decided to come with me?
Jake: Well, Umm, I know I'm going to regret this but Yeah! I'm Coming.
(They both walk into the car)
Jake: Ehh Mack, Who are those people coming towards us?!
Mack: Duhh.. The Possy? Innit?
Jake: They have knives and bats..
Mack: Didn't you understand the part when i said "Mansion Raid" on the phone yesterday?
Jake: Mack.. I'm getting scared.
(Boys with hoodies come and approach the car)
Boys: Yo Mack, Who's your little friend here?
Mack: Yo Possie! This ma friend Jake, he gonna help us.
Boys: (slowly patting bats on their hands) Haha. He looks like a mommy's boy. Boys, Batter him!
(Screaming in pain)
To Be Continued.

item.title: Drama Homework /lock
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

The plot thickened to climax of the most paramount proportions. Character development was superb and makes me crave another one of your fabulous tales. Send this to a publisher ASAP.

item.title: Drama Homework /lock
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:15, topic:480982”][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=599219.msg4255007#msg4255007 date=1362590061]

I’m going to cry

I don’t know whether it’s a bad or a good comment, so…
If it was a bad one: Just shut the love up. I’m only 11. So give it a rest!
If it was a good one: O thanks
[/quote]
Implying that age means anything? Arham is only a year older than you and is already well on his way to being a competent programmer, just because you’re 11 doesn’t give you reason to tell people to shut the love up for criticising your work. If you don’t like criticism then don’t post, simple as.[/quote]
Why post on something you don’t need to?
Mod Lock Please. I don’t need feedback, gave homework in ages ago.

Read full topic
